mapper.select: SELECT /* OrderItemMapper.selectById */ ORDER_ITEM_ID , ORDER_ID , ORD_SEQ , ORD_PROC_SEQ , PRODUCT_ID , QUANTITY , PRICE_AT_ORDER FROM ORDER_ITEM WHERE ORDER_ITEM_ID = #{orderItemId}
SELECT /* OrderItemMapper.selectByOrderId */ ORDER_ITEM_ID , ORDER_ID , ORD_SEQ , ORD_PROC_SEQ , PRODUCT_ID , QUANTITY , PRICE_AT_ORDER FROM ORDER_ITEM WHERE ORDER_ID = #{orderId} ORDER BY ORD_SEQ

SELECT /* OrderItemMapper.selectByOrderIdAndOrdProcSeq */ ORDER_ITEM_ID , ORDER_ID , ORD_SEQ , ORD_PROC_SEQ , PRODUCT_ID , QUANTITY , PRICE_AT_ORDER FROM ORDER_ITEM WHERE ORDER_ID = #{orderId} AND ORD_PROC_SEQ = #{ordProcSeq} ORDER BY ORD_SEQ
SELECT /* OrderItemMapper.selectAll */ ORDER_ITEM_ID , ORDER_ID , ORD_SEQ , ORD_PROC_SEQ , PRODUCT_ID , QUANTITY , PRICE_AT_ORDER FROM ORDER_ITEM ORDER BY ORDER_ITEM_ID
